storyInfo: Hope lingers among the ashes, while thunder rumbles overhead. A real war awaits Rhodes Island and the Self-Salvation Corps.

attributes.content: Vina!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Did I fall sleep?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You're lucky to be out for just a little bit after your injuries.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Siege, Self-Salvation Corps reinforcements have arrived. This place is relatively safe. Rest well; we'll be at your side.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Mm...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: She scans the faces of her friends.
Everyone is bruised and battered, just as she is. But they are alive, and there is still hope in their eyes.
Except...
...Allerdale.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The door to the Mausoleum of Kings has closed once again.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: The Sarkaz have noticed the sound of the Steam Knight, and they must have guessed that the Sighs of Kings has left its home. They're sending men to the palace.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Our scouts have tried to get close to the entrance, but there has been no sign of Allerdale.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Do you want to talk about what happened below?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Just as the warriors imagined.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Allerdale Cumberland sacrificed herself to save us.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Sounds like something Allerdale would do. Cumberland the Ever on High.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Cumberland...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: There's no such thing as Cumberland the Ever on High, Clovisia.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Allerdale protected what she wanted to protect with her life.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Not out of any duty... simply of her own accord.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Her own accord...
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Yes, she was brave.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Shame... I had a surprise for Allerdale when she came back.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: This is...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The ducal manor is in ruins, but the scouts found this among the ashes.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: The steam armor of House Cumberland.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It wasn't lost in the fire...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Haha.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: If only she could see this.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Then she would have known that there is no such thing as a fixed path.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The fire had not taken away all the hopes that she placed on the armor.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Clovisia, we saw a Steam Knight in the Mausoleum of Kings.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Maybe the last one.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Four years ago, the Duke's men lured the Steam Knights into the Mausoleum of Kings, where they were ambushed by the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: That passage is the tomb of the Steam Knights.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: What a gruesome scene it must have been, even though I was not there to see it.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: He attacked you, didn't he? He attacked the heir to the throne of Victoria.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: He was just doing his job.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: He's defending the Sighs of Kings, even if it was merely an excuse to lure the Steam Knights into the mausoleum.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: He witnessed comrade after comrade fall, and spent so many years in darkness. The pain must have gnawed away at his sanity.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Words like these are too simple to describe what went through the mind of this warrior.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: On one side, the tombs of the kings. On the other, the bodies of his fellows. He defended the silent resting place for countless days and nights.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: He was no madman or ghost. His will was so strong that it conquered death.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: By his own will, he exacted revenge on a Victoria that betrayed him.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: By his own will, he defended the symbol of Victoria.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I don't know if we'll ever see him again.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: If... if he can escape the darkness...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: May he once again find what he wants to defend.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We found the mercenaries who went to Highbury, general.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Bring them forward.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* L-Let me go!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: A mere girl...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: She was found tied up on the streets with her fellow mercenaries.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I checked her weapons, and there were few signs of use. She hardly even qualifies as a merc.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Is that so?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Speak, mercenary.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Did you not kill a single Victorian?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Uwah...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Are you afraid of me?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: N-No!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I-I failed my mission. You can punish me. But l-let the others go!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Take her back.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: General...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You said she hardly qualifies as a mercenary.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Young Sarkaz like her don't understand what we fight for, nor the true face of our enemy, because no one ever taught her.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The real war is about to begin.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I will show her what this war means to the Sarkaz. She will watch it unfold by my side.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Feist!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Rockrock... ha, Squad 11 of the Self-Salvation Corps, back together again, eh?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: There's only the two of us left from Squad 11.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But I'm sure we'll grow again.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: We have the Doctor and the commander, after all.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.options: What's the situation, Clovisia?;How is the Corps faring, Clovisia?

attributes.content: The retreat was initiated on-time, but we suffered heavy casualties.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: And we're facing a supply shortage after Allerdale went missing.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: If only we had more hands...
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: You've got a few here.
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: Totter?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: My employer has gone missing, so my contract is now null and void.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Are you sure you want to stay?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: We're already here. Hard to get out when you're on the wrong side of the Sarkaz anyway.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: And we fought alongside Dagda's group in the mausoleum.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: I may not have made it out alive, if not for them.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Another debt... I guess I need to push my retirement back.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Doctor, we're here.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.options: Hello, Misery.;On time as usual.

attributes.content: Sorry. I wished we'd moved quicker and helped you at the command tower.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: And you are...?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Horn, leader of the 2nd squad of the Tempest Platoon of Victoria.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Misery helped us break into a prison at the border of Auchterigg and Highbury a few hours ago.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We rescued a Defense Force patrol that was about to be executed for refusing to fight for the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We'll be operating with Rhodes Island and the Self-Salvation Corps from this point on.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.options: Looks like we have some new friends, Clovisia.

attributes.content: Thank you, everyone.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: It's a pleasant surprise, one that has opened up many possibilities.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Although we took heavy losses, we did manage to obtain important information about the Sarkaz supply lines.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Commander, Doctor, here's the intel on potential depots in Highbury.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Add to that the data that Closure obtained from the command tower...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.options: We'll be able to locate the supply line.;The hint to our next step lies within this intel.

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: We'll make preparations for the battles ahead.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Kyngasycath, the Sighs of Kings.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I know you're there, Gawain.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Show yourself.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: There is no one around her.
...Duty.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You've been with me all this time. What is the duty that you've chosen for me?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: To put a king on the throne of Victoria again?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Silence.
Allerdale... she aspired to be a Steam Knight, yet...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We can't always know what we're heading towards.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: If, one day
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: If, one day I strayed from the destiny that you chose for me.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Would you become my nightmare?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The only sound in the underground space is a quiet sigh.

attributes.options: Ascalon.;Hello, Ascalon.
How are Kal'tsit's injuries?

attributes.content: ...Serious.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: But Shining is here. She'll recover.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: If the Banshee Lord and I arrived in time...
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.options: Repelling the Sanguinarch was plenty.;It's not your fault.;We got away only because you slowed the 'Red-Eye'.
Amiya...

attributes.content: She's recovering. You can see it. She won't let herself sleep for too long.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.options: I didn't see what she saw.;I'm never there with her when I should be.

attributes.content: You've always cared a lot about Amiya. All the versions of you.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.options: I never had a chance to ask.
Did you suspect that I was pretending to have amnesia?;Do you trust me, Ascalon?

attributes.content: My dagger will answer that question.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: ...When necessary.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.options: I want to know the truth of what happened four years ago.
I've asked Kal'tsit.;I've asked Amiya.
But I don't know what's true and what's not.
I hardly ever get a chance to sit down and talk to you.;You're always quiet.
Can you tell me what you saw?

attributes.content: Four years ago, you sent me on a mission away from the landship.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Her Majesty had left us by the time I returned.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.options: What was the situation at Rhodes Island?;What about Amiya?

attributes.content: Rhodes Island had to escape before Theresis's army surrounded us.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Amiya was in a coma after inheriting the King of Sarkaz's powers.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.options: What about Kal'tsit?

attributes.content: She wanted to save Rhodes Island, save Amiya, and save you.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.options: Save me?

attributes.content: It was Her Majesty's final order.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Doctor... Doctor... Dr. {@nickname}...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Amiya...
I'm here.;I won't leave you.

attributes.content: Amiya grabs your clothing subconsciously, then slowly loosens her grip.
Tears flow from her eyes.
Theresa...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She showed me the voices of the Sarkaz souls.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They wanted to take revenge on everyone who has wronged the Sarkaz. They wanted to take revenge on Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Kal'tsit?;What does this have to do with her?

attributes.content: ...I believe that everything I felt was real, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I remember how Dr. Kal'tsit and Theresa spent many nights talking at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I remember how Dr. Kal'tsit went a whole week without sleeping to save a group of Sarkaz Infected.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But it's true that she wronged the Sarkaz, two hundred years ago...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit must have told Theresa why she did it at the time.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And Theresa must have accepted it, which was why they became such good friends.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But even I... even I, who knows Dr. Kal'tsit so well...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I felt anger and sorrow when I felt the memories of the war.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Maybe that's what Theresa wanted to tell me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Theresa wanted to tell me why she sided with the souls of the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They are there... above Londinium.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The sound of thunder approaches.
It is outside the window, above your heads, never far away.

attributes.options: War is coming.

attributes.content: You hold Amiya's hand.
The two of you look up at the sky together.
Rumble. Rumble. Rumble.
Even the nearby cities feel the vibration, not just Londinium.
A massive object, the likes of which has never been seen before, rises up from the dark clouds.
Behind it, the thick clouds atop The Shard finally crack open. Those who have raised their heads to look up finally realize it was no ordinary cloud that surrounded Londinium.
It was a Catastrophe cloud, far more massive than what any Catastrophe Messenger has ever recorded.
Sparks fly out of the overcharged black clouds, rumbling like thunder.
The strange flying machine is like the eye of the storm.
Beneath its gaze, there is nowhere for the enemies of the Sarkaz to run.
2:28 P.M. / Overcast
Tradersmill City, Victoria
Chenchen!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: What're you daydreamin' about? Hughes is waitin' for us. Sounds like he got a really solid lead.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: The one who just left Hughes's house...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Look at this crowd. Who are you talking about?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: The green-haired Feline.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I think I've seen her before.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Well, you've got a better memory for faces than I do. Maybe she was there to talk business with Hughes? Did you see her at the station a few days ago?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: It's a memory from many years ago.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Not a criminal you caught in Lungmen, is she?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: If that was it, I wouldn't have forgotten.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Never mind. We can just ask Hughes.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...Bagpipe.
attributes.name: Harmonie

attributes.content: I've seen the other in the intel too.
attributes.name: Harmonie

attributes.content: Hehe...
attributes.name: Harmonie

attributes.content: We almost had a touching reunion.
attributes.name: Harmonie

attributes.content: Victoria South Office
Hello.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: You're... I've seen you in the sickbay at HQ, haven't I?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: There's something I would like to ask of you.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: Please give this letter to Dr. Kal'tsit and Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: You... ahem. Are you planning to leave the office?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: You should submit an application, like the other evacuating operators. Just so that HR is on top of things, you know...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: They know.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: They know there's something I have to do.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: I'll only bring danger to the rest of you, if I stay here.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: You want to protect Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Rhodes Island... is a quiet place.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: I like it here, and I'm thankful to you. Especially the Sankta who left us... you've given me the peace that I always sought.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: And now, I repay this peace.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: I'm ready.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: The Sarkaz airship has taken off within Londinium.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: The heir to the Duchy of Cumberland is missing. The Duke of Caster did not obtain the Sighs of Kings.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: A dozen Messengers have visited your demesne in a single day.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: They want to know whether you are ready to grant them an audience.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: What do you think, Your Highness... Princess Eblana?
attributes.name: Duke of Wellington

attributes.content: Duke Wellington...
Right before my eyes... I see a new Taran era.
